item.title: Useful Resources and Links for Swedish Learners
item.description: Resources Digital lexicons & dictionaries Vocabulary and lists Corpus tools Podcasts Youtube Online courses Websites Communities Blogs Digital books Physical books Smartphone apps Online bookstores News outlets Television Radio Resources Here follows an index of useful resources that might help you on your way to mastering Swedish. Digital lexicons & dictionaries Svenska.se Three official monolingual Swedish dictionaries in one website: use SAOL for spelling and inflections, and SO for definitions, pronunciations and etymology.
